item.title: Select Current User by Default in People Picker
item.description: In case you are building a canvas app in Power Apps and you need to have the current user selected in a people picker combobo box by default, this is a quick and easy way to achieve this. Create a people picker combobox First insert a combo box control in your app and set its’ Items property to: Choices(DataSource.PersonTypeColumn) In the above formula DataSource referes to data source such as a Dataverse table or SharePoint list and PersonTypeColumn refers to a column inside that data source which is of type Person/Group.
